name: Hero of the Mage Guild
text: If you control a "Mage Guild" monster except "Hero of the Mage Guild": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Mage Guild" card from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Hero of the Mage Guild" once per turn. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card whilst you have a Link Monster in your Pendulum Zone (Quick Effect): You can negate that activation and destroy that card.
pendulum_text: You cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck except Spellcasters. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can add 1 "Mage Guild" card from your GY to your hand.
